definition: to decide/to determine/to execute (sb)/(of a dam etc) to breach or burst/definitely/certainly

sentences.english: It also covers in detail state appellate decisions construing the policy provisions.
sentences.chinese: 还包括详细的解释政策条款的州上诉决议。

sentences.english: The company to RenHui forever, I resolution people a break.
sentences.chinese: 仁惠把公司交给永民，本人决议休息一段时间。

sentences.english: Its new resolution authority allows the regulator significant access to systemically relevant firms.
sentences.chinese: 新决议授权监管机构可以有效介入公司相关系统。

sentences.english: Village work to get to meet with siew, he put away the resolution dove.
sentences.chinese: 中村功得以脱身去与萧船见面，他决议除掉白鸽。

sentences.english: In the run-up to the vote, the role of the United States and the international community became a subject of controversy.
sentences.chinese: 在决议新宪法草案前，美国与国际社会反应不一。

sentences.english: The resolution was acclaimed with one voice.
sentences.chinese: 决议博得满场异口同声的欢呼。

sentences.english: We have resolved that our school should have a dining-room.
sentences.chinese: 我们决议学校要开个餐厅。

sentences.english: The United Nations Security Council approved a joint cease-fire resolution.
sentences.chinese: 联合国安理会通过了一个联合停火决议。

sentences.english: Research indicates that self-monitoring increases the probability of keeping the resolution.
sentences.chinese: 研究证明，自控可以助长遵守决议的可能性。

sentences.english: First, in carrying out its work, the CD should respect and take into full consideration resolutions of the UNGA as it embodies the most representative multilateral mechanism.
sentences.chinese: 第一，开展工作时应充分考虑并尊重联大决议。

sentences.english: The objectives set out by the resolution seem to me to broader than what is commonly thought. Para.
sentences.chinese: 依我看来，决议设定的目标远比一般人的理解要宽泛。

sentences.english: Decisions are made by consensus at the weekly meeting.
sentences.chinese: 决议通过周会的共识产生。

sentences.english: He rough-hewed the resolution of the meeting and sent it to the chairman.
sentences.chinese: 他草草写出大会决议的提纲，然后把它交给主席。

sentences.english: One key way I track my progress is through my Resolutions Chart.
sentences.chinese: 跟踪进步的一个关键是通过我的决议图。

sentences.english: A good outsourcing decision may bring the enormous benefits to the enterprise.
sentences.chinese: 但非，一个功闭于的外包决议计划同样会毁了企业。

sentences.english: The resolution was invalid because the shareholder's meeting was not quorate.
sentences.chinese: 因股东大会不够法定人数，故该决议无效。
